name: Lantern (Pre-alpha)
description:
This game is currently in pre-alpha. There is not very much content yet!

In a post-apocalyptic world, robots are humanity's greatest hope to restore the earth to its former glory. Play as Ember, a girl on her way to a robotics competition when she is approached by a threatening stranger. Navigate through a mysterious forest, solve puzzles, and discover the true cause of the world's suffering.
